headline: Assessing Campbell Soup (CPB) Valuation After EPS Pressure And Snacks Leadership Change
summary: Campbell's (CPB) is back on investors’ radar after a 17.3% six month share price decline and weakening earnings per share, just as the company brings in Mohit Anand to lead its Snacks division. See our latest analysis for Campbell's. The recent Snacks leadership change comes against a weak share price backdrop, with a 10.9% 90 day share price return and a 31.1% 1 year total shareholder return both in decline. This suggests momentum has been fading as investors reassess earnings pressure and...

headline: Can Campbell's (CPB) New Snacks Chief Subtly Rebalance Its Growth And Margin Narrative?
summary: Earlier this month, Campbell’s appointed Mohit Anand as Executive Vice President and President, Snacks, placing him in charge of brands such as Goldfish, Pepperidge Farm, Snyder’s of Hanover, Lance, Kettle Brand, Cape Cod, Snack Factory and Late July. His arrival from Kellanova and Mars comes as Campbell’s snacks unit faces stagnant volumes and profitability pressure, raising the stakes for a turnaround. We’ll now examine how Anand’s appointment to lead the Snacks division could reshape...
